Articles.Content:
So basicly just rate the Signature of the user above you on a scale of 0/10 to 10/10 with 10/10 being the highest

And if you want include a reson for the rating, improvment, or just a genaral coment.

And remember NO SIDE CONVERSATIONS...OR DERAILMENTS...OR GOING IN CRICLES

the only OOC alowed is question/anwsers about the sig

we have an IRC channel for that here

Edited January 31, 2014 by briansun1

4/10

I don't understand the half of your sig... But the Fluttershy's quote and ultramarines thing have became a common thing.

8/10

I can not give full point due to TRF and the 1/2 brony thing

(i'll PM you)

2/10

It seemed really cluttered and I didn't understand any of it. Points for effort, though...

8/10

other than the fact that I can't read 1/2 of it due to derpy forums it's fine

but no full point due to mentioning THAT WHICH SHALL NOT BE NAMED

10/10

"Forget this, forget everything. Logic didn't just go out the window, it went off a cliff." Hilarious.

10/10

this quote

"Banned for banning a person who was banned before and has banned others who have been banned who in turn have banned you."

and well the ISE tribute...

6/10,

quotes quotes and quotes

Wrong thread, friend.

Also, 4/10: I'm fundamentally against the commercialization inherent in corporate advertising.

7/10

Well, A logical quote, good. The other part is partialy hidden, but the drawing board sound awesome.

8/10

"Still half-brony"

7/10

Interesting, however...

I didn't understand it. It hurtz mah brain

2/10

just your name with kerbals
2/10 can't read it all.
8/10 nice achievements. Starwhip can i use the big three sig thing?

3/10

Eh, not so good. (@ theattackcorgi Shut up, we can't have any more conversation threads!)

10/10

your one of the main posters

also NO SIDE CONVERSATIONS we have an IRC channel for that

logic didn't just go out the window, it went off a cliff.

I very much enjoy throwing things off cliffs!

9/10
8/10 Nice picture

7/10

Cool pixel art...
7/10 Rainbow factory quote.

8/10

ridions there too over used.. but that quote... and no thing on derailing every thread...

8/10

"... Ultramarines never have to deal with **** like that. Then again, they are the Ultramarines. Rebels don't surrender out of fear of them, they surrender because the last they want is another lecture about their prowess in battle." - Hehe

8/10

large company banner... don't hate but don't really like... (that was you wasn't it...)
8/10 Slightly...er...disturbing...but funny quotes
